meanings.definition: To reduce the power rating of something.
meanings.sent1: The technician is derating the engine to make it safer.
meanings.sent2: It is important to derate the equipment to prevent overheating.
meanings.sent3: The derating process may seem tedious, but it ensures longevity.
meanings.sent4: Derating the system is like dimming a bright light to avoid burning out.
meanings.sent5: Remember to derate the voltage to avoid damaging the circuit.

meanings.definition: The act of decreasing the maximum power output of a device or system.
meanings.sent1: The derating of the generator was necessary for safety reasons.
meanings.sent2: Derating can help prolong the lifespan of electronic components.
meanings.sent3: The derating of the amplifier made it less powerful but more reliable.
meanings.sent4: The derating of the engine was a precautionary measure against failures.
meanings.sent5: Proper derating is crucial for maintaining the efficiency of the system.
